    Covariance Adjustment for Randomized Trials Variance Estimation Testing Using A Simple Linear Specification Regression Discontinuity Designs Design based sandwich SEs for differences of Hajek estimators Introduction to the 'flexida' package Covariance-adjusted standard errors in a clustered longitudinal setting Non-Binary Treatment Data structures to support standard error calculations for direct adjustment assisted by a prior covariance model

(Internal) Updates des@call's formula with the currently defined variable names.

Source: R/DesignAccessors.R
dot-update_call_formula.Rd

Helper function to update the call with the appropriate variable names after they've been modified. Called within Design replacers.

Usage

.update_call_formula(design)

Arguments

design

A Design

Value

An updated formula

Details

It's return should be stuck into the design via des@call$formula <- .update_call_formula(des)
